item.title: Need fast help asap!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

well i did the tut for only makeing the attack option in wild
but when at fightpits theres no attack option heres the code

if(isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); outStream.writeByteA(0); outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } }
make it work at fight pits please
